entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers. Risk of freezing drizzle near noon. Fog patches developing this afternoon. Wind southeast 20 km/h. High 7. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers this evening then partly cloudy. Fog patches dissipating after midnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming west 20 near midnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 6. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Thursday 6 April 2023
